ygData.subject: Re: Song Lock Whip?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... song I am playing seems to lock. When this happens all the spell buttons turn back to normal and I cant start a song new because the other one is still
ygData.messageBody:
>I use a tentical whip every once in a while. When it does the lifetap the
song I am playing seems to lock. When this happens all the spell >buttons
turn back to normal and I cant start a song new because the other one is
still going, nor can I stop it without haveing to log or zone.

Yes! Exactly the same thing happens with my magic axe that casts Berserker
Strength. Sounds like it may be a bug on all auto-spell-casting weapons.
Please, everyone who encounters this file another /bug report. It's
crippling to the Bard class.

By the way, being stunned by a monster also unlocks it. Sometimes being
bashed without stun seems to as well, but I'm not sure about that. The
/stopsong command does NOT fix it.

- Windsong, on Solusek Ro
